product_name: Moving Comfort Serendipity Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With an internal bra and drawcord at the waist, the strappy Moving Comfort Serendipity Tank Top will keep you covered throughout your yoga practice so you can stay confident and centered.
